label: Protectionism: Positive
hypotheses_short: The quote is positive towards protectionism, for example protection of internal markets through tariffs or subsidies
hypotheses_long: The quote is positive towards protectionism, for example in favour of protection of internal markets through tariffs or export subsidies or quotas

label: Protectionism: Negative
hypotheses_short: The quote is negative towards protectionism, for example in favour of free trade or open markets
hypotheses_long: The quote is negative towards protectionism, for example in favour of free trade or open international markets

label: Other
hypotheses_short: The quote is not about protectionism or free trade
hypotheses_long: The quote is not about protectionism or free trade
